description.@en: The Elves came to this world first, the favored children of nameless gods. Their radiant perfection has been carefully preserved in the histories of your kin through written and oral traditions. This age-long lineage has made your people distant and fickle, but it has also given them insight beyond the Ã†theric Veil and nature of the world around them.

effect.@en: Whenever learning new Magicks, you always succeed at your Incantation Test. Additionally, you never have to sacrifice Reward Points to finalize the process. You can learn more in Chapter 10: Grimoire.
